Cryotek:
     He sat back down in the chair and looked over his dragon head arm thingy. "Things are about to get very interesting for you, Megatron." He got up and walked past Rancor, who scurried after him.
     Cryotek went into a lab and started pulling things out from drawers, he did not bother to pull up blueprints, he knew what he wanted. But he did not have two hands. He looked at Rancor, "You there, come and help me."
     Rancor did as he was told, tentivally. Cryotek pointed to a piece of machenery, "You're going to help me, now, put that on there," This went on for some time, until there was a claw looking thing on the table. Cryotek now looked pissed, he picked up a glass jar and smashed it in his hand, "We don't have the right piece." He said simply, leaving the unfinshed device, and Rancor in the room.
     Cryotek walked back to the office and sat, watching the monitors, learning, he turned on the computers and allowed his nurelnet to absorb everything he could.
Rancor:
     He didn't want to follow the pissed off dragon anymore, so he stayed behind, looking at things. Soon, though, he got bored and left the lab, he went into a garage like room and shuffled through some of the items there. Then, he found something very interesting, it was a simple can, but it was marked "White Spray Paint" He opened it and shook it, then pressed the little button, the can shot out a stream of white mist. Rancor was intreaged. He looked at his bare chest and aimed the can at himself, after a few seconds he had a lovely white spider painted on his chest, the paint started to drip down, so it looked a little disgruntled.
     "Oh, I like this!" He said with glee.
 Rudra656@... wrote:::Cygnar:: 
      He glances at his handy chronometer.  "It's time for my meeting.  He walks out past Cryotek.  "Soon, we will attack.  Until I return you are in charge."  He leaves the base and takes off into he air, heading for the island.

<P>Cryotek:
<P>     He sat back down in the chair and looked over his dragon head arm thingy. "Things are about to get very interesting for you, Megatron." He got up and walked past Rancor, who scurried after him.
<P>     Cryotek went into a lab and started pulling things out from drawers, he did not bother to pull up blueprints, he knew what he wanted. But he did not have two hands. He looked at Rancor, "You there, come and help me."
<P>     Rancor did as he was told, tentivally. Cryotek pointed to a piece of machenery, "You're going to help me, now, put that on there," This went on for some time, until there was a claw looking thing on the table. Cryotek now looked pissed, he picked up a glass jar and smashed it in his hand, "We don't have the right piece." He said simply, leaving the unfinshed device, and Rancor in the room.
<P>     Cryotek walked back to the office and sat, watching the monitors, learning, he turned on the computers and allowed his nurelnet to absorb everything he could.
<P>Rancor:
<P>     He didn't want to follow the pissed off dragon anymore, so he stayed behind, looking at things. Soon, though, he got bored and left the lab, he went into a garage like room and shuffled through some of the items there. Then, he found something very interesting, it was a simple can, but it was marked "White Spray Paint" He opened it and shook it, then pressed the little button, the can shot out a stream of white mist. Rancor was intreaged. He looked at his bare chest and aimed the can at himself, after a few seconds he had a lovely white spider painted on his chest, the paint started to drip down, so it looked a little disgruntled.
<P>     "Oh, I like <EM>this</EM>!" He said with glee.
